content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Copper Cable Factory at (2.5, 17.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Cable factory input chest at (2.5, 17.5)
• Burner inserter (placed at the factory interface) at (3.5, 17.5)
• New factory burner inserter (retrieved earlier) at (2.5, 16.5)
• Additional burner inserter (feeding the assembling unit) at (1.5, 17.5)
• Assembling machine (assembling-machine-1) at (1.5, 19.5)

### Belt Depot at (3.5, 15.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Depot wooden chest (crafted and placed as belt depot) at (3.5, 15.5)
• Dedicated transport belt segment (adjacent to the chest) at (4.5, 15.5)
• Depot burner inserter (placed next to the depot chest) at (3.5, 14.5)

### Extraction System at (–3.5, 27.5)
Consists of the following entity:
• Extraction system burner inserter (with drop position at (–3.5, 28.5)) at (–3.5, 27.5)

### Electricity Generator at (–0.5, 24.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Steam engine (generator) at (–0.5, 24.5)
• Boiler at (–5.5, 24.0)
• Offshore pump at (–7.5, 25.5)

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Errors when connecting transport belts to an invalid target  
 – Transport belts cannot be connected directly to a steam engine. Always add an inserter that feeds the steam engine and use that inserter as the target.

• Errors when placing an entity out of range  
 – Ensure the player is within the maximum allowed placement distance before attempting to place an entity.

• Errors due to missing inventory items  
 – Verify that the required item is available in the inventory prior to placement.

• Errors due to undefined variables  
 – Confirm variable names and definitions (for example, avoid referencing a non‐existent “target_chest”) to prevent NameError issues.
